Description: Assessment of body-fat composition is important to keep track of your weight loss program. The body-fat percentage analysed is employed to evaluate the status of an individual’s health and fitness. The JSB Pocket Body Fat Monitor from JSB Healthcare provides you an affordable and easy way to monitor your body-fat percentage in addition to measuring your weight. This health care device is a Hand-Held Analyzer that includes a less intrusive, faster and easier new way of measuring body-fat percentage. This multi-function JSB Pocket Body Fat Analyzer is small in size and portable; you can conveniently carry it wherever you go. This JSB health care equipment uses a revolutionary measurement technique called Bioelectrical Impedance Analysis, these scales send a small, harmless electrical current through one hand and travels down to the waist area, back up the body and through the other hand to the other electrode. This current passes more slowly through fat than muscle, giving you a measurement of how much fat is in your body compared to the muscle, or your body-fat percentage. The smart Body Fat Monitor with innovative technology can be carried around while jogging or taking a walk. The multi-function feature lets you measure the steps taken while jogging/walking, the distance travelled and calories burnt during your workout regime;   based on the results displayed on the smart LCD display you can work toward your well-being.
